Name: Conflagration
Description: Make every Ignite explodes and inflicts {Damages[0]} damages to target.
Every monster taken in the explosion sudden {Damages[1]} damages and has {OtherValues[0]}% of chances to be affected by a new Ignite.

Name: FireBall
Description: Launch a Fireball in front of the player.
If the Fireball hits a monster,it sudden {Damages[0]} damages and apply <<Status[0]>>

Name: Fire Blessing
Description: The Goddess of fire gives you a <<Status[0]>>.

Name: Solar Burn
Description:
Invokes an enormous eruption from the sky that explodes at the targeted point.
At the impact, if the Solar Burn hits an entity, it sudden {Damages[0]} damages.
Otherwise, every target caught in the explosion sudden {Damages[1]} damages.
Critical hits inflicts 4x more damages instand of 2x.
